CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( PersonEmail )), CONTAINS(PersonEmail, "@"), LEN(SUBSTITUTE(PersonEmail, "@", "")) = LEN(PersonEmail) - 1, CONTAINS(RIGHT(PersonEmail, LEN(PersonEmail) - FIND("@", PersonEmail)), "."), LEN(RIGHT(PersonEmail, LEN(PersonEmail) - FIND(".", PersonEmail))) > 1 ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Has Valid Email Address
